name: antd_mobile_extra
description: Ant Design 移动版组件拓展

scripts.lint: npm run tslint && npm run srclint && npm run demolint && npm run stylelint
scripts.tslint: antd-tools run ts-lint && npm run compile && rm -rf lib
scripts.tslint-fix: antd-tools run ts-lint-fix && npm run compile && rm -rf lib
scripts.start: cross-env --max_old_space_size=9000 NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cross-env DEMO_ENV=react bisheng start -c ./site/bisheng.desktop.config.js" "cross-env DEMO_ENV=react bisheng start -c ./site/bisheng.kitchen.config.js"
scripts.start-hd: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cross-env DEMO_ENV=react bisheng start -c ./site/bisheng.desktop.config.js" "cross-env DEMO_ENV=react HD_ENV=hd bisheng start -c ./site/bisheng.kitchen.config.js"
scripts.start-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "cross-env DEMO_ENV=react bisheng start -c ./site/bisheng.desktop.config.js" "cross-env DEMO_ENV=react bisheng start -c ./site/bisheng.kitchen.config.js"
scripts.site-pub: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "cross-env DEMO_ENV=react bisheng build -c ./site/bisheng.desktop.config.js" "cross-env DEMO_ENV=react bisheng build -c ./site/bisheng.kitchen.config.js"
scripts.site: ./node_modules/.bin/gulp && cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "cross-env DEMO_ENV=react pubUrl=/antd_mobile_extra/ bisheng build -c ./site/bisheng.desktop.config.js" "cross-env DEMO_ENV=react pubUrl=/antd_mobile_extra/ bisheng build -c ./site/bisheng.kitchen.config.js"
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run site && bisheng gh-pages --push-only
scripts.start-kitchen: cross-env --max_old_space_size=9000 NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cross-env DEMO_ENV=react bisheng start -c ./site/bisheng.kitchen.config.js"
